item.title: How to speak so that people want to listen | Julian Treasure
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eIho2S0ZahI Have you ever felt like you’re talking, but nobody is listening? Here’s Julian Treasure to help you fix that. As the sound expert demonstrates some useful vocal exercises and shares tips on how to speak with empathy, he offers his vision for a sonorous world of listening and understanding. Julian provides a solution by sharing the six vocal exercises he uses before each time he speaks publicly.
